00051 
00052 /***********************************************************************************
00053  This Function calculates the actual distance in millimeters(mm) from the input
00054  analog value of Sharp Sensor. 
00055  ***********************************************************************************/
00056 
00057 /***** Function to Initialize PORTS *****/
00058 void init_ir()
00059 {
00060  DDRF = 0x00; 
00061  PORTF = 0x00;
00062  DDRA = 0x0F;
00063  PORTA = 0x00;
00064  DDRL = 0x18;
00065  PORTL = 0x18;
00066  DDRC = 0xFF;
00067  PORTC = 0x00;
00068  DDRJ = 0x00;
00069  PORTJ = 0xFF;
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00073 unsigned int Sharp_estimation(unsigned char adc_reading)
00074 {
00075  float distance;
00076  unsigned int distanceInt;
00077  distance = (int)(10.00*(2799.6*(1.00/(pow(adc_reading,1.1546)))));
00078  distanceInt = (int)distance;
00079  if(distanceInt>800)
00080  {
00081   distanceInt=800;
00082  }
00083  return distanceInt;
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 int front_dist_mm(void) 
00088 {
00089   //float front_distance;
00090   int front_distance_mm;
00091   unsigned char analog_val;
00092   analog_val = ADC_Conversion(11);
00093  
00094 
00095  front_distance_mm=Sharp_estimation(analog_val);
00096   return front_distance_mm;  
00097 
00098   //return 100;
00099 }
